entry.title: creichert/hsgui
entry.summary:
Haskell GUI Project Template

Haskell Gui Project Template

About:

Use this code as a starting point for a gtk2hs application. Included getOpts support for handling command line arguments. Ui included uses the glade xml format.

A large portion of this code was inspired by examples in "Real World Haskell" and other various resources found in the Haskell Platform documentation.

Building:

$ cabal configure --prefix=$HOME --user
$ cabal build
$ ./dist/build/gui/gui
